JCatalogue Client Download

Maven Users

Maven users can declare the dependency in the pom.xml:

<dependencies>
  [...]
  <dependency>
    <groupId>com.terradue</groupId>
    <artifactId>jcatalogue-client</artifactId>
    <version>0.1</version>
  </dependency>
  [...]
</dependencies>

Manual installation

Download the JCatalogue Client tarball, extract it, and put all the jar libraries, contained in the /lib directory, in your application classpath.
